thread.title: A good night not far from Gare du Nord
thread.title_full: A good night not far from Gare du Nord - Review of Hotel de Bellevue Paris Gare du Nord, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: satisfiedcanadia2017
title: A good night not far from Gare du Nord
text: Very good night in a nice hotel close to Gare du Nord and only three hundred fifty meters (5 minutes on foot) from Metro station La Chapelle (direct access to several RER and subway lines), in a very multicultural part of Paris
